node.excerpt: To present work of this year’s Devine graduates, we wanted to do something more. After a brainstorming session, we ended up with presenting their work on an 8-screen setup. We want to use these 8 screens in a dynamic way: sometimes they’ll form one big viewport on an image or video, in other…

Good morning all! (or evening, night, … depending on when you read this post of course). As you might know, I’ve been working on AIRKinect (as3nui.com) and I’ve got a side project AIRServer aswell (which allows you to setup air as a socket server, including websocket support). Wouldn’t it be fun, to…

frontmatter.title: Accessing the kinect in javascript through websockets
